item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30...am sure you will laugh and have a good time. The Shana Stack Band will be the band this Saturday. If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there....

If you are getting cabin fever folks....this is the place to be!
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
